skills: Python, Terraform, DynamoDB,Lex, Lambda, Bedrock, Kendra
description:
Delivered a conversational AI solution with a web-based chatbot hosted on Amazon ECS, enabling natural dialog through a user-friendly interface.
Used Amazon Lex for intent recognition and AWS Lambda for intent fulfillment, executing business logic based on user interactions.
Integrated a LangChain-based agent that accessed customer-specific data from DynamoDB, searched indexed documents via Amazon Kendra, and leveraged Amazon Bedrock FM for general knowledge responses.
Enabled Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) using Kendra to provide contextually accurate answers with source attribution, improving transparency and user trust.

skills: Python, Terraform, Lambda, Kinesis Firehose, Glue, Redshift, QuickSight, PySpark
description:
Designed a near real-time analytics architecture for a financial services customer at AWS using Kinesis Firehose, Lambda, Glue, Redshift, and QuickSight.
 Enabled ingestion of clickstream and transactional data, with PySpark-based ETL pipelines for data cleansing, timestamp standardization, and enrichment using reference data in Redshift. 
 Collaborated with the customer to write advanced SQL queries for analytics and supported QuickSight dashboard development for visualization. 
 Guided the customer in deploying the solution using Terraform, resulting in a successful production rollout and improved analytics capabilities.

skills: Python, DynamoDB, Brazil, Turtle, CRUX, Pipelines, Apollo, Redfort, Fleet Management, VIP
description:

project: Tech Refresh to migrate 500 TB of hadoop data
skills: Red Hat Linux, Teradata, Ab Initio, Oracle, SQL, Hadoop, Hive, Python, Shell scripting, Terraform, Kafka, Spark Streaming, Autosys
description:
Led a team of production support staff to provide 24/7 coverage for 500TB data migration effort during Hortonworks Tech Refresh project. The data was migrated from the data center in Alabama to another in Minnesota over bank's dedicated network using parallel distributed copy command.

Post Migration Support: Improved internal processes by monitoring performance of SLAs/OLAs, creating preventative action items using incident management metrics, and replacing manual redundant tasks through automation that resulted in overall reduction of issues by 50% YOY. Partnered with various application teams to onboard applications, maintain the health of data engineering pipelines, and assist with RCA. Enabled new hires on various data processing applications, real-time and batch processing through knowledge transfer and shadowing.

skills: SQL Server 2014, Teradata 15, SQL, T-SQL, Ab Initio, Linux, TFS, Jira, UDeploy, Jenkins, Autosys, Business Analysis
description:

client: CDC - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

skills: JD Edwards BI Suite, Informatica PowerMart, MicroStrategy, SQL Server 2000, Oracle 8, SQL, T-SQL, ASP
description:
Played a significant role in deploying JD Edwards Business Intelligence solution that comprised of Informatica and MicroStrategy tools.
Ahmed worked with PeopleSoft consultants and successfully implemented PeopleSoft/JD Edwards Business Intelligence Solutions version 4.0 in the development and production environment.  He also documented the whole BI implementation process (Informatica, MicroStrategy, and WebSphere) that comprises of comprehensive installation, configuration and troubleshooting steps. The robust BI environment and documentations enabled operations team to perform future upgrades without any issues.
Ahmed also designed and developed PeopleSoft Business Intelligence Information site to show JD Edwards source and DW target metadata.
